name: ts-graph-mcp
description: TypeScript code graph with MCP server and Web UI for AI coding agents

scripts.check: npm test && npm run test:e2e && npm run build && npm run lint:fix
scripts.build: tsc && npm run build:ui && chmod +x dist/main.js && cp package.json dist
scripts.benchmark:call-chain: npm run build && npx tsx benchmark/lib/setup.ts sample-projects/call-chain && npx tsx benchmark/lib/run.ts sample-projects/call-chain
scripts.benchmark:layered-api: npm run build && npx tsx benchmark/lib/setup.ts sample-projects/layered-api && npx tsx benchmark/lib/run.ts sample-projects/layered-api
scripts.benchmark:monorepo: npm run build && npx tsx benchmark/lib/setup.ts sample-projects/monorepo && npx tsx benchmark/lib/run.ts sample-projects/monorepo
scripts.benchmark:all: npm run benchmark:call-chain && npm run benchmark:layered-api && npm run benchmark:mixed-types && npm run benchmark:monorepo
